product_name: Club Ride Vibe Long Bike Jersey - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Not into the whole bright-colored spandex thing? The men's Vibe Long Bike Jersey from Club Ride lets you ride in comfort and arrive looking cool, collected and ready to party. Stretchy fabric frees up your arm movements, wicks moisture and dries fast. Underarm vents aid airflow. Zippered chest pocket and zippered rear pocket with media port. Club Ride Vibe Long Bike Jersey for men features a trim fit and reflective accents. Closeout.
short_description: Not into the whole bright-colored spandex thing? The men's Vibe Long Bike Jersey from Club Ride lets you ride in comfort and arrive looking cool, collected and ready to party.
